so get your zucchini this is 1 and 1/2
pounds about five of them and just put
them into the broiler what you want to
do is get them SuperDuper charred so
just put them in there turn them
occasionally and let them get all
blackened that could take about 25 to 30
minutes whoa look at those those are

they're kind of hot you're supposed to

I am slice them in half this will

out of the skins creamy delicious
chari tasting flesh and you want to

fine sieve set over a bowl the water
will just like drain out into the bowl
but isn't it crazy though how soft it
gets the skin sort of holds in the
moisture and the zucchini becomes this
creamy amazing soft delightful and very

firm I would say about 10 minutes just
to drain and you can press on it a
little bit to remove some of the liquid
but there's already tons of liquid
coming out zucchini is a lot more watery
than you might imagine
like it doesn't look that watery but
really it is so you don't want tons of
that water in there so just leave that
let it sit for about 10 minutes and then
come back all righty guys over here I

like a small clove though you don't want

intense so like a half a teaspoon of
minced
probably two tablespoons of tahini then
add about a teaspoon of lemon zest I
would just go ahead and use the zest of
an entire lemon make sure you scrub your

the lemon juice and a little bit of salt
and pepper
you can always season again later and
then puree it
what seems about right I think all right
